Docs.summary: Returns why a shortcut has been disabled.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Content.PM.ShortcutDisabledReason DisabledReasonAppChanged = (2)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Content.PM.ShortcutDisabledReason enum directly instead of this field.", true)

Docs.summary: Shortcut has been disabled due to changes to the publisher app.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Content.PM.ShortcutDisabledReason DisabledReasonBackupNotSupported = (101)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Content.PM.ShortcutDisabledReason enum directly instead of this field.", true)

Docs.summary: Shortcut has not been restored because the publisher app does not support backup and restore.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Content.PM.ShortcutDisabledReason DisabledReasonByApp = (1)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Content.PM.ShortcutDisabledReason enum directly instead of this field.", true)

Docs.summary: Shortcut has been disabled by the publisher app with the ShortcutManager#disableShortcuts(List) API.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Content.PM.ShortcutDisabledReason DisabledReasonNotDisabled = (0)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Content.PM.ShortcutDisabledReason enum directly instead of this field.", true)

Docs.summary: Shortcut is not disabled.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Content.PM.ShortcutDisabledReason DisabledReasonOtherRestoreIssue = (103)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Content.PM.ShortcutDisabledReason enum directly instead of this field.", true)

Docs.summary: Shortcut has not been restored for unknown reason.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Content.PM.ShortcutDisabledReason DisabledReasonSignatureMismatch = (102)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Content.PM.ShortcutDisabledReason enum directly instead of this field.", true)

Docs.summary: Shortcut has not been restored because the publisher app's signature has changed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Content.PM.ShortcutDisabledReason DisabledReasonUnknown = (3)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Content.PM.ShortcutDisabledReason enum directly instead of this field.", true)

Docs.summary: Shortcut is disabled for an unknown reason.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Content.PM.ShortcutDisabledReason DisabledReasonVersionLower = (100)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Content.PM.ShortcutDisabledReason enum directly instead of this field.", true)

Docs.summary: Shortcut has been restored from the previous device, but the publisher app on the current device is of a lower version.
